flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: First, you need to know about a forgotten American hero, Lucien Yeomans. Everything that we can can find about him is here http://tinyurl.com/4opseyw in our "files" section. His patent is 95 years old and naturally needs a little updating especially since most of us are not planning to make 16" shells for battleships as his tools were meant to do.

guide.summary: The lathe is based on a forgotten WW1 concrete machine-tool technology that we combine with a broken vehicle engine block, crank and flywheel. I designed this for use in Developing Countries but it will work anywhere.
